sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_mab_api.AlertHandler</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Used to represent errors to show Mobile App Builder front end</description>
        <name>AlertHandler</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AlertHandler = Class.create();
AlertHandler.prototype = {
    initialize: function () {
    },

    type: 'AlertHandler',

    generateMissingM2MChildAlert: function (parentTable, parentSysId, childTable) {
        var alertType = 'missingM2MChild';
        var alertData = {
            parentTable: parentTable,
            parentSysId: parentSysId,
            childTable: childTable,
        };

        return {
            type: alertType,
            alertData: alertData,
        };
    },

    generateUnretrievableNodeAlert: function (tableName, sysId) {
        var alertType = 'unretrievableNode';
        var alertData = {
            table: tableName,
            sysId: sysId,
        };

        return {
            type: alertType,
            alertData: alertData,
        };
    },

};
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-07-28 18:25:30</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2d2f5f720f253010e70a4abec4767e76</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AlertHandler</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Mobile App Builder API" source="sn_mab_api">3c64259bc7812010100f2f3bf4c2609a</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Mobile App Builder API">3c64259bc7812010100f2f3bf4c2609a</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2d2f5f720f253010e70a4abec4767e76</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-07-28 18:25:30</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
